faqs.question: What is a School Fees Loan?
faqs.answer: This is a digital loan product for MTN Mo Mo eligible customers to access school fees loans through the MTN Mo Mo platform. The funds are disbursed directly to student codes, ensuring secure and targeted payment to educational institutions. Customers can access the service by dialing *165*80# and selecting School Fees Loan from the menu. Key product features include: Processing Fee: 3% of the disbursed school fees amount Interest Rate: 5% per month Repayment Period: 3 months, with flexible weekly or monthly instalment options Penalty: 2.5% of the outstanding value.

faqs.question: How do I sign up for the School Fees Loan Product.
faqs.answer: Follow these simple steps to sign up on the Furaha App; Dial *165*80# and select School Fees Loan. You will be prompted to enter the MTN Mo Mo PIN and accept Terms.. and Conditions. A message is sent to confirm your registration.

faqs.question: How do I apply for School Fees Loan after registration.
faqs.answer: Once you have successfully signed up, follow the below steps to take up a School Fees Loan: Dial *165*80# Select School Fees Loan Select 1 to proceed Select Take a loan Enter amount (This should be within the Minimum.. and Maximum amount) Select the school fees aggregator and enter student code Review displayed student details Select how to pay (Weekly, Monthly) Review loan details and confirm to pay school fees.

faqs.question: What are the loan limits offered for the School Fees Loan?
faqs.answer: Through USSD The minimum loan amount one can access is UGX 200,000 and the maximum loan amount is UGX 400,000. However, you can access higher limits by downloading Furaha App Specific customer limits within the minimum and maximum ranges are determined by our various capability assessment criteria.

faqs.question: Can I change the repayment frequency of my school fee loan?
faqs.answer: No, you cannot change the repayment frequency of your School Fees Loan once you have successfully applied and received it however, you can pay before your scheduled repayment date.

faqs.question: Can I take a School Fees Laon for more than one child?
faqs.answer: No, you can only take a School Fees Loan for one child. You can take another loan after paying off the first loan. We will provide for the multiple loans option soon!.

faqs.question: Can I get a School Fees Loan for a child whose school does not use any aggregator?
faqs.answer: The School Fees loan is disbursed directly to your child’s school. This means that the school should be using either School Pay or Pegpay for their school fees collection.

faqs.question: Can I access the school Fees Loan for any level of education?
faqs.answer: The School Fees loan currently supports children within Pre-Primary, Primary and Secondary levels of education. for tertiary, universities and post-graduate levels of education.

faqs.question: How will I know the school aggregator to select during application for the school fees loan?
faqs.answer: You will need to contact your child’s school to obtain the name of the aggregator and student code. Please note that the school fees Loan can only be paid through School Pay and Peg Pay at the moment.

faqs.question: How will I know the outstanding School Fees balance?
faqs.answer: During the application for a School Fees Loan, the school fees balance will be displayed once you enter your child’s student registration number. In case no balances are shown, please contact the school for an update before proceeding with the application process.

faqs.question: How long does the School Fees loan approval process take?
faqs.answer: The loan approval process is instant.

faqs.question: What happens if my application is rejected?
faqs.answer: If the application is declined, you will be notified on the rejection reason.

faqs.question: Can I edit or update my loan application after submission?
faqs.answer: You cannot edit details of the loan application once you have reviewed and submitted.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for obtaining a school fees Loan?

faqs.question: How much is it to use MTN Senkyu?
faqs.answer: MTN Senkyu is absolutely free. MTN is saying thank you to all its loyal customers for their support.

faqs.question: Who can use MTN Senkyu?
faqs.answer: Any MTN customer can sign up for the service from anywhere at any time. Just dial *141# and select Join or use the My MTN App.

faqs.question: How do I get MTN Senkyu points?
faqs.answer: After signing up for MTN Senkyu, simply use MTN voice, data, messaging or Mo Mo services and you will earn points.

faqs.question: What can I get with MTN Senkyu?
faqs.answer: With MTN Senkyu, you can get free voice minutes, MBs, SMS or you can also use it to pay using MTN Mo Mopay at any merchant.

faqs.question: How do I use my MTN Senkyu points?
faqs.answer: To use your MTN Senkyu points dial *141# and select Use Points then follow the prompts.

faqs.question: When can I use my MTN Senkyu points?
faqs.answer: You can use your MTN Senkyu points at any time provided you have sufficient points.

faqs.question: How do I check if I have enough MTN Senkyu points?
faqs.answer: To check how many points you have dial *141# and select Check Points.

faqs.question: How long do my MTN Senku points last?
faqs.answer: Your MTN Senkyu points are valid for 3 months and will expire if unused for that period. Use some or all of your points within 90 days or they all expire.

faqs.question: Is there a limit to how many MTN Senkyu points I can have on my number?
faqs.answer: You can have as many MTN Senkyu points as you want.

faqs.question: What is aYo Senkyu Cover?
faqs.answer: MTN Senkyu customers can now use their points to get insurance cover. Customers can get MyHospital in case of hospitalization owing to an accident.. and MyLife cover in the unfortunate instance of death.

faqs.question: How do I get aYo cover using MTN Senkyu?
faqs.answer: To use this service, dial *141# and select aYo Senkyu cover. You have to accept the terms and conditions and then select the cover plan.

faqs.question: How much is it to use aYo Senkyu cover?
faqs.answer: 75 points will be deducted every month for 6 months in order for you to get aYo insurance cover using MTN Senkyu.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of aYo Senkyu Cover?
faqs.answer: You will get UGX 90,000 MyLife cover and UGX 120,000 MyHospital cover.

faqs.question: How do I claim my insurance cover from aYo?
faqs.answer: You can do it directly from your mobile phone by dialing *296# and selecting option 7, or via the aYo website: www.ayo4u.com.
